thread.section_title: Vaya Adventures Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vaya Adventures | www.vayaadventures.com
thread.title: Jeff

author: Jeff
title: Jeff
text:
We booked a pretty complex trip for a month in South America, including main land Ecuador, Galapagos, Lima, Cuzco and Machu Picchu, as well as the Amazon. Gabriela did all the heavy lifting - all I had to do was explain my needs and wants and she filled in all the blanks for us!
Accommodations were 'just right', and the time in each locale and the tour guides provided were all top notch. Thank you Avaya!! Gabriela was there all the way, and questions were always handled promptly. A great value for taking the stress of trying to arrange all this on my own...
